mapper.select: select branch_office_id, branch_name, city_name,province_name,signatories from branch_office order by branch_office_id
mapper.insert: insert into branch_office ( branch_office_id, branch_name, city_name, province_name, signatories) values ( #{branchOfficeId}, #{branchName}, #{cityName}, #{provinceName}, null (#{signatories})::json )
mapper.update: update branch_office set signatories = (#{signatories})::json where branch_office_id = #{branchOfficeId}
